#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
    long long int t,zero,one,pzero,pone;
    char a[1000001],b[1000001];
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",a);
        scanf("%s",b);
        zero=0;one=0,pzero=0,pone=0;
        for(long long int i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
        {
            if(a[i]!=b[i])
            {
                if(a[i]=='0')
                {
                    one++;
                }
                else
                {
                    zero++;
                }

            }
            if(a[i] == '1')
                pone++;
            else
                pzero++;
        }
        if((one != 0 && pone==0) || (zero != 0 && pzero==0))
        {
            printf("Unlucky Chef\n");
            continue;
        }
        printf("Lucky Chef\n");
        printf("%lld\n",std::max(one,zero));
    }
    return 0;
}
